message:
Oct. 27, 2025:

Top Priority: Renewal readiness and timeline entries in Gainsight. Keep up the deep discovery; have customers walk you through what it takes to build and test APIs today, and continue to keep the How To Use Postman guides top-of-mind.
tool_update:
Foundation Scores (Looker) and performance improvements now available.

Roadmap:

  • Automatic cursor CLI setup (automated brief generation by next week?)
  • Automated analysis
  • Linkedin Integration
  • Public News integration
